comment: people on the plane. Souce: French Medias.
amr:
# ::snt people on the plane. Souce: French Medias.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :location (p2 / plane))
      :snt2 (ii / ignore-01
            :ARG0 (m2 / media
                  :mod (c / country
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "France")))))

# ::snt .: No survivors expected.
(e / expect-01
      :ARG1 (p / person
            :polarity -
            :ARG0-of (s / survive-01)))

# ::snt oh GOD not again
(p / person
      :name (n / name
            :op1 "God")
      :mod (o / oh
            :mode expressive)
      :mod (a / again
            :polarity -))

comment: people on board. Plane has crashed near the town of Digne (southern French Alps).
amr:

(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :location (b / board-01
                  :ARG1 (p2 / plane)))
      :snt2 (c / crash-01
            :ARG1 p2
            :ARG1-of (n / near-02
                  :ARG2 (t / town
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Digne")
                        :location (s / south
                              :part-of (m2 / mountain
                                    :name (n3 / name

                                          :op2 "Alps")))))))
